PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-13062014-11-27,  TC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Transportation Information Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION INFORMATION REGULATIONS in order to improve rail safety overall and the safety of the Canadian public through better risk based planning and performance measurement, more focused audits and inspections, targeted programs for specific safety issues and opportunities for increased stakeholder engagement before incidents occur.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0285 Publication Date: 2014-12-17
AttachmentsAttachment
